name: Reduced-Threat Hezrou
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Stench: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a DC 12+1d6 + 9 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

actions.Multiattack: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
